metadata.name: Magical Swirl-Caesar
metadata.description:
In a whirl of excitement,
I wrapped myself in magical cloth,
Ready to join my furry friends
On a journey filled with fun and froth.

We danced and twirled and played all day,
Beneath the sun and stars above,
Our bond as strong as any made,
By the magic of this furry love.

So if you're feeling down or blue,
Just grab some cloth that's magical and new,
And gather all your furry friends,
And let the fun and joy begin.
